Bluetooth Not Available Error: Bluetooth is not available, please confirm that Bluetooth is turned on.
Bluetooth No Permission Error: Failed to get the required permissions, please allow permissions in settings.
Bluetooth Scan Failed Text: Scanning device failed, please confirm Bluetooth is turned on.
Device Need To Be Bound: Device needs to be authorized first
BLE No Results Reason 1: 1. Make sure that the PocketDevice is powered by USB and the indicator light flashes blue.
BLE No Results Reason 2: 2. Make sure that the Bluetooth has been turned on. If the Bluetooth is working abnormally, you can try to restart the Bluetooth in the phone settings.
BLE No Results Reason 3: 3. For Android phones, you need to allow PocketDrive to access your device's location.
BLE No Results Reason 4: 4. Try to get your phone close to your PocketDrive.
Set WiFi Error: Failed to connect to the network. Please confirm that the password is correct.
Color Code Auth Text: Please check the device indicator and select its status.
Configure WiFi Text: Configure the device's Wi-Fi to connect the device to the same network with your phone.

Phone Not Connect to WiFi Text 2: Please connect to Wi-Fi and refresh.
WiFi Password Input Text Part 1: The device will be connected to
WiFi Password Input Text Part 2: , please enter the password for this Wi-Fi:

Color Code Auth Timeout: Authentication timed out, please return and reconnect
Connect to Device via Ip Failed: Unable to connect to your device, please make sure the device is connected to the same router as your phone or on the same intranet segment. Current device ip:

Login Failed With EVOLUMEFILE: Failed to read the config files from disk. Please reformat the disk
Login Failed With EVOLUMEFORMAT: The disk format is incorrect. Please reformat the disk
Login Failed With EVOLUMEMISS: The disk volume is missing. Please reformat the disk
